I dont want it on in case I lose my phone which is why I turn it off. Every time I log on it turns it back on again and I have to remember to turn it off. Bit of a security issue if you ask me.

The old app was much better, this is a nightmare. Very difficult to place a bet - which should be the core function  of a betting app - as it regularly fails to load the betslip. Also regularly fails to recognise me, even though I'm auto logged in. Think I'll take my business elsewhere...

There are some great elements to this app; the layout is good, the enhanced boost feature is good and when it works it's great.  Unfortunately like others have said it crashes too often and doesn't let you access elements of your account at times despite showing you as logged in. Think I may head elsewhere.

Its great when it works. Â  Its the only betting app I've ever used. Something about the brand name draws me to it over the others. The layout is clear and UI is user friendly. Plus no charge on withdrawals which is nice.  However, recently, for large periods of time the app hangs / reports "no internet connection" when it is defiantly not a problem with my internet. During these periods I can't place any bets. (The icon just spins) and I cannot access any of the menus on the bottom navigation bar. So I've missed out on some bets recently. This is only made more aggravating when I can see my friend on the IOS version working perfectly.  If the hanging can be sorted, I can't think of anything else they need to add.

App gets stuck during live betting even if your internet connection is great. The William Hill customer service is also very rude and patronizing as they insisted "there were no issues with the app today" when I called to file a complain. Terrible experience! There are far better options out there.
